name: Rodrigo Riveros  - RodMTL
body:
Welcome to RodMTL

# About Me
I'm a Colombian engineer, I've been always passionate about computers and software. I have experience working in BPM and e-commerce systems. I got great skills in database development including MSSQL and Oracle. 

Proud father and husband, I'm living in Montreal since 2014.
